text: One Hundred Men and a Girl is a 1937 American musical comedy movie directed by Henry Koster. Deanna Durbin, Adolphe Menjou, Leopold Stokowski, Eugene Pallette, Alice Brady, and Alma Kruger were in it. It was distributed (spread around) by Universal Pictures. The movie was nominated for 5 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1938. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1937 comedy movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Koster
title: One Hundred Men and a Girl
